messages.message: Invalid bytesPlanes in basic DFD block. The values do not match the expected values.
messages.details: DFD block #1 bytesPlanes in basic DFD block are 12 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 but for VK_FORMAT_R32G32B32_SFLOAT textures these must be 12 0 0 0 0 0 0 0.

messages.message: Invalid bytesPlanes in basic DFD block. Multiplane formats are not supported.
messages.details: DFD block #1 bytesPlanes in basic DFD block are 12 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 but bytesPlane[1-7] must be 0 as multiplane formats are not supported.
